title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting, embedding, and pulling models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components for building RAG or agent pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that plugs into any Ollama instance; supports multi-user, RAG, and model management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI with conversation history, model switching, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama server to Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library (Maven Central) for chatting, pulling, and deleting models via Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API with concurrent streaming support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper that exposes Ollama as GenServer processes for fault-tolerant LLM workflows.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama server and CLI to nixpkgs with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up ephemeral Ollama containers for CI pipelines to test LLM features.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK (NuGet) for integrating Ollama into ASP.NET or desktop apps with async streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API via reqwest.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI sidebar for summarizing notes and answering vault questions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server (Node) that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI fork adding an Ollama backend so users can switch between llama.cpp and Ollama servers.
